song.englishname: You Are So Good To Me

english.segment1: You are beautiful my sweet, sweet song. You are beautiful my sweet, sweet song. You are beautiful my sweet, sweet song. And I will sing again
english.segment2: You are so good to me. You heal my broken heart. You are my Father in Heaven (2x)
english.segment3: You are beautiful my sweet, sweet song. You are beautiful my sweet, sweet song
english.segment4: You ride upon the clouds. You lead me to the truth. You are the Spirit inside me (2x)
english.segment5: You are my strong melody, yeah. You are my dancing rhythm. You are my perfect rhyme. And I will sing of You forever
english.segment6: You poured out all Your blood. You died upon the cross. You are my Jesus who loves me (2x)
english.segment7: You are my Father in Heaven. You are the Spirit inside me. You are my Jesus who loves me
